title: Darkvision
excerpt: The ability to see in the dark without a light source.

# Darkvision

A creature with Darkvision can see better in low-light conditions than a creature with normal vision. Within a specified range (usually 60 or 120 feet), a creature with Darkvision has the following benefits:

*   **In [[dim_light|Dim Light]]**: You can see as if it were [[bright_light|Bright Light]]. This removes the Disadvantage usually applied to Perception checks in shadows.
*   **In [[darkness|Darkness]]**: You can see as if it were [[dim_light|Dim Light]]. You can discern shapes and movement, but you cannot discern colorâ€”only shades of gray.

### Superior Darkvision
Some subterranean creatures, such as Drow and Deep Gnomes, possess **Superior Darkvision**. This works identically to standard Darkvision but extends to a range of **120 feet**.
